name: America
startIntroPart2: Can you stop the spread of Communism? Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: War is the only way... for freedom!
attacked: America will not fall to your ideas, never!
defeated: its over... but Democracy will not..!
introduction: As the President of America, I welcome you to the home of the free.
tradeRequest: These agreements will do good for our relations... Only if you agree.
